mapper.select: select x.* from (select rownum as rnum,before_ord.* from (select m.name, before_tab.* from (select c.board_no,c.user_id, c.title, substr(c.reg_date,0,14) as reg_date,c.board_status,c.site_id, s.site_name from check_board c,site s where c.site_id = s.site_id) before_tab, member m where before_tab.user_id = m.user_id and m.user_id = #{user_id} order by before_tab.reg_date desc) before_ord where rownum < #{paging.endnum}) x where x.rnum>= #{paging.startnum}

select m.name, before_tab.* from (select c.board_no,c.user_id, c.title, substr(c.reg_date,0,14) as reg_date,c.board_status,c.site_id, s.site_name from check_board c,site s where c.site_id = s.site_id) before_tab, member m where before_tab.user_id = m.user_id and m.user_id = 'admin' order by before_tab.reg_date desc

select c.board_no,m.name, c.user_id, c.title, c.board_content, c.reg_date,c.board_status,c.site_name from (select board_no,check_board.user_id, check_board.title, check_board.board_content, substr(check_board.reg_date,0,14) as reg_date, check_board.board_status,check_board.site_id, site.site_name from check_board,site where check_board.site_id = site.site_id) c,member m where c.user_id = m.user_id and c.board_no = #{board_no}
select password from MEMBER where user_id = #{user_id}
select count(board_no) from check_board where user_id = #{user_id}
select token_id from web_token where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: update web_token set token_id=#{token} where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select token_id from app_token where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: update app_token set token_id=#{token} where user_id=#{user_id}
